name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
title: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
desc: New branches and sprouts grow into a forest.

skills.desc:
If you have Burning Flame/Dendro Core or Bountiful Core/Catalyzing Field on the field, deal 1 Pyro DMG/Hydro DMG/Electro DMG to the opposing active character.
(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
